item.title: I can't pickup
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Kay you are pissing me off. Delete your entire pickup code right now. Make sure you don’t delete an extra bracket or leave an extra bracket. Now, replace it with the one united pkzz gave you:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } }

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights > 1) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");

int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {

}

item.title: I can't pickup
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

It’s not working because you’re probably trying to spawn the item wrong. If you want coins, you have to type 00995, not 995. If you want a santa hat, you have to type 01050, not 1050. The way your command is, it has to read a 5-digit item id, otherwise it won’t work. The way the command reads the item id and amount is dumb anyways, you should make it read them by determining the spaces in the command when it’s typed.

Read full topic

item.title: I can't pickup
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
            try {
                int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
                int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

                if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                    addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
                }
            } finally (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
            }
        }

in this

client.java:12326:

the numbers after client.java:*****: - also the *
means that is the line it is on
just paste that exact line

item.title: I can't pickup
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Hi, i made a rsps and the pickup command suppose to be for admin+. but it won’t let me pickup. When i try to pickup, it say : cmon type it agian! Please, tell what i need to delete in the code to active my pickup.

Theres the code :

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
        }
    }

Read full topic
